name: Veils Tale
description:
Made for the Quacky Jam "Life isnt fair" theme. I took the theme pretty literally i guess, because there is no natural health regen.

Veil is just a mage who kills another mage over and over whos stats vary every fight!

How to play:
Normal keyboard movements: WASD to move, SPACE to jump

Combat: You attack with Left mouse button and aim with your cursor.


Instructions for download:
1. Download the zip file
2. Unzip the file
3. Open the VeilsTale exe
4. Enjoy!
